snippet.title: Microsoft: new flaw affects all supported versions of Excel
snippet.description: ...Microsoft today issued Security Advisory (968272), which details a vulnerability found in Microsoft Office Excel that could allow for remote code execution if a user opens a specially crafted Excel file. Products affected include Office 2000, Office 2002, Office 2003, Office 2007, Office 2004...

snippet.title: Analysis Tool Pack working its way back to Mac Excel 2008
snippet.description: ...The loss of VBA scripting from Office for Mac 2008 was especially hard on Excel. Besides the many custom macros that would no longer work, important add-ons, like Solver and Analysis Tool Pack... last summer, and, according to the Mac Excel team's Gavin Shearer, the Analysis Tool Pack...

snippet.title: Analysis Tool Pack back for Excel 2008 as third-party app
snippet.description: ...Microsoft's Mac Business Unit has announced that it has a solution for Excel 2008 users who suddenly found themselves without the Analysis ToolPack, the Visual Basic-based data analysis add-on from previous versions of Excel. The Mac Excel team collaborated with third-party software developer AnalystSoft, and the two came up with StatPlus:mac LE.StatPlus:mac LE is a wholly independent applic...

snippet.title: As ITC mulls Xbox, iPhone import bans, Senators target patent system
snippet.description: ...The International Trade Commission is currently considering whether to ban imports ofMicrosoft's Xbox 360game console andApple's iPhone. With that in mind,the US Senate Judiciary Committee this morning asked if more can be done to prevent tech companies from blocking sales of rival products by asserting patents that are critical to industry standards.Judiciary Committee Chairman Sen. Pa...

snippet.title: Microsoft Office 2007 SP2 has landed
snippet.description: ...As expected, Microsoft has released Office 2007 Service Pack 2, consisting of a slew of general product fixes and updates.
